messages.subject: Meeting other SCA folk in unexpected places
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.arvindguptatoys.com/arvindgupta/homeschoolerssix.pdf An interesting thing about this study is that two of the informant families are mine and Duke
messages.messageBody:
http://www.arvindguptatoys.com/arvindgupta/homeschoolerssix.pdf

An interesting thing about this study is that two of the informant families are mine and Duke Cariadoc's, though not in that context. Both our families are prominently featured. It's a few years old, but wasn't online.

From the list of a few dozen "informants" for the research:

Sandra, Kirby, Marty, & Holly Dodd; ... David Friedman & his family...

This copy of the report is hosted on a page by a science educator in India. I got to meet him last fall in his "lab."

The interviewer is more artist than researcher, and we had fun interacting with her.

AElflaed (Sandra)
